title: What goes well with Congress?
content:
Working on a wedding invitation project and thinking about using the Congress Bold font as the main headline font:  
 [http://www.youworkforthem.com/font/T1486/congress](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819211455/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T1486/congress "http://www.youworkforthem.com/font/T1486/congress")

Would like some recommendations of others to put into the mix.
author: joejohnson9182
